overview: #BOSSBABE is set in the sardonically comical and painfully real world of pyramid schemes. The triad in question: Bevlon. A girl power makeup company...run by a man. Desperate to climb the Bevlon ranks, Sofi throws a recruitment party for a few girlfriends. When one of her guests drops dead (attention-seeker much!) Sofi uses it as an opportunity to get closer to the other girls. Together, they must unravel the mystery of the murder, and decide what matters more- their friendship or Bevlon.
title: #BOSSBABE
